title: Can't login
body:
Hi I keep getting "did not receive a response from the server".

Other games work fine, net works fine, service status for oce says okay and I managed to login and play yesterday. Anyone else getting a problem?

replies.body:
Hey shecamealong,

If you're unable to connect to the servers after a patch, I'd guess that it may be because your firewall doesn't recognize League of Legends as an accepted connection. Can you try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article, starting with the ones that pertain to firewall?
yes i cant log in the game too. this happens a lot lately each time there is an update
